titleStmt.title: Usury explain'd, or, Conscience quieted in the case of putting out mony at interest by Philopenes.
titleStmt.author: J. D. (John Dormer), 1636-1700.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Dormer the Jesuit (pseud. of John Huddleston). cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
